abstract: The names of notifications that the accessibility system generates.
rawMarkdown:
---
source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/UIKit/notification-names
crawled: 2025-12-02T16:30:49Z
---

# Notification names

**API Collection**

The names of notifications that the accessibility system generates.

## UI changes

- **screenChanged**: A notification that an app posts when a new view appears that occupies a major portion of the screen.
- **layoutChanged**: A notification that an app posts when the layout of a screen changes.
- **pageScrolled**: A notification that an app posts when a scroll action completes.
- **switchControlStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Switch Control setting changes.
- **elementFocusedNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when an assistive app focuses on an accessibility element.
- **reduceTransparencyStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Reduce Transparency setting changes.
- **buttonShapesEnabledStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Button Shapes setting changes.

## VoiceOver

- **announcement**: A notification that an app posts when it needs to convey an announcement to the assistive app.
- **voiceOverStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when VoiceOver starts or stops.
- **announcementDidFinishNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system finishes reading an announcement.
- **UIAccessibilityVoiceOverStatusChanged**: A notification that UIKit posts when VoiceOver starts or stops.

## Text

- **boldTextStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Bold Text setting changes.
- **closedCaptioningStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the setting for Closed Captions + SDH changes.

## Colors

- **darkerSystemColorsStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Increase Contrast setting changes.
- **grayscaleStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Grayscale setting changes.
- **invertColorsStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the settings for inverted colors change.

## Assistive apps

- **assistiveTouchStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that indicates a change in the status of AssistiveTouch.
- **guidedAccessStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that indicates when a Guided Access session starts or ends.
- **pauseAssistiveTechnology**: A notification that pauses an assistive app’s operations temporarily.
- **resumeAssistiveTechnology**: A notification that resumes an assistive app’s operations temporarily.
- **UIAccessibility.AssistiveTechnologyIdentifier**: Identifiers for assistive apps.

## Audio and speech

- **monoAudioStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when system audio changes from stereo to mono.
- **speakScreenStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Speak Screen setting changes.
- **speakSelectionStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Speak Selection setting changes.
- **hearingDevicePairedEarDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when there’s a change to the currently paired hearing devices.

## Motion

- **reduceMotionStatusDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Reduce Motion setting changes.
- **shakeToUndoDidChangeNotification**: A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Shake to Undo setting changes.

## Notifications

- **Notification dictionary keys**: Handle notifications with keys in the user info dictionary.
- **post(notification:argument:)**: Posts a notification to assistive apps.
